document.full_text: even as zimbabwe's president boasts that he will live to 100, officials in his party and in south africa worry about what will happen if he dies in office.
document.title: health in doubt, mugabe, 87, vows to stay in power
lines_and_colors: even as zimbabwe's president boasts that he will live to 100, officials in his party and in south africa worry about what will happen if he dies in office.
